description: Request for Proposal for the acquisition of Bladder Kits intended for the Department of National Defence. Delivery locations will be CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt. The bid should indicate ability to supply multiple options. Deliveries will be made in Canada. Preference will be given to Canadian products and services. Formal responses are required in either English or French. Documents are available through the Canada Buy website. Request for English or French Language articulation, as preferred. Contractors and suppliers may service Canada only. Detailed request , detailed procurement requirements listed below. Minutes of Bid (Act Exhibits or Letter)

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Details
### Contract Name:         2030-99-257-7667 BLADDER KIT
### Contract Reference Number: cb-604-46522959
### Amendment Number:     8
### Solicitation Number:   W8482-242146/A
### Publication Date:       2023-10-16
### Tender Closing Date:   2023-10-31T14:00:00
### Amendment Date:        2023-10-31
### Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-07
### Expected Contract End Date:  2024-10-16

## Contract Overview
The Department of National Defence is seeking bidders to provide the following products in support of Canadian Forces operations.

### Catalogue Code: *
       [25111900 - Marine craft systems and subassemblies]

### NSNs: * 
99-257-7667 BLADDER KIT

The items will be delivered to Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia, and Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia. 

## Tender Procedure
This contract is subject to a competitive, open bidding process. Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Delivery and Payment Terms
- Corresponding to the requirements outlined above
- Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars
- Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected

## Language
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Additional Requirements
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.

## Contracting Entities
- Contracting Entity Name: National Defence Canada
- Contact Information: Katharine Barker
  Contact Email: Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca
  Contact Phone: (343) 598-6913

## Notice and Responses
- The Tender Notice may be accessed at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

- All correspondence should be sent to the referred email address

Please allow industry partners to inform nation wide. Thank you
Selene David - Technical Writer. 
==========================================
